title: Empowering Low-Resource Language Translation: Methodologies for {B}hojpuri-{H}indi and {M}arathi-{H}indi {ASR} and {MT
authors:
Singh Anand, Harpreet  and
Ratna Dash, Amulya  and
Sharma, Yashvardhan
venue: Proceedings of the 21st International Conference on Spoken Language Translation (IWSLT 2024)
abstract: The paper describes our submission for the unconstrained track of ‘Dialectal and Low-Resource Task’ proposed in IWSLT-2024. We designed cascaded Speech Translation systems for the language pairs Marathi-Hindi and Bhojpuri-Hindi utilising and fine-tuning different pre-trained models for carrying out Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) and Machine Translation (MT).
